thread.title: BRIEF-Chikaranomoto Holdings and MYU PLANNING to set up JV in Tokyo

author: admin
title: BRIEF-Chikaranomoto Holdings and MYU PLANNING to set up JV in Tokyo
text: Home / NEWS / BRIEF-Chikaranomoto Holdings and MYU PLANNING to set up JV in Tokyo BRIEF-Chikaranomoto Holdings and MYU PLANNING to set up JV in Tokyo 2 hours ago NEWS , tokyo March 15 (Reuters) â€“ Chikaranomoto Holdings Co Ltd * Says co and MYU PLANNING INC. plan to set up a Tokyo-based JV IMAGINE INC on April 10 * Says the JV will be capitalized at 30 million yen and be mainly engaged in restaurant related business and consulting of overseas business * Says co will hold 80 percent stake in the JV Source text in Japanese: goo.gl/FNrFSB Further company coverage: (Beijing Headline News)
